SELECT /* codeQuery.locationCodeList */ IDX , CODE , CODE_DETAIL , DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS REG_DT FROM BG_CODE WHERE 1=1 AND PARENT_CODE = 'BOT'

SELECT /* codeQuery.list 2013.08.21 최지순 */ CODE , IDX , CODE_DETAIL , CODE_LEVEL , PARENT_CODE , CODE_DETAIL , DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS REG_DT FROM BG_CODE WHERE 1=1
AND (CODE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR CODE_DETAIL LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%'))
ORDER BY IDX DESC
LIMIT #{startNo}, #{perPage}

SELECT /* codeQuery.totalCount 2013.08.21 최지순 */ count(*) FROM BG_CODE WHERE 1=1
AND (CODE LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR CODE_DETAIL LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%'))
SELECT /* codeQuery.detail */ CODE , IDX , CODE_DETAIL , CODE_LEVEL , PARENT_CODE , CODE_DETAIL , DATE_FORMAT(REG_DT,'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS REG_DT FROM BG_CODE WHERE IDX = #{idx}
mapper.delete: DELETE /* codeQuery.deleteChild 2013.08.21 최지순 */ FROM BG_CODE WHERE PARENT_CODE IN (SELECT CODE FROM (SELECT CODE FROM BG_CODE WHERE IDX = #{idx}) A)
